text: The 2001 Tour de Hongrie was the 28th edition of the Tour de Hongrie cycle race and was held from 8 to 12 August 2001. The race started in Veszprém and finished in Budapest. The race was won by Mikoš Rnjaković. ==General classification== {| |Final general classification {| class="wikitable" |- ! scope="col" | Rank ! scope="col" | Rider ! scope="col" | Team ! scope="col" | Time |- | style="text-align:center;" | 1 | | Spartak Subotica | style="text- align:right;" | |- | style="text-align:center;" | 2 | | Cornix-Invest Pécs | style="text-align:right;" | + 23" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 3 | | Podbrezová | style="text-align:right;" | + 23" |} |} ==References== 2001 Tour de Hongrie Tour de Hongrie
